short_description: Capture 4K Video & 20MP Photos: Record your adventures in stunning detail with ultra-clear 4K video at 60fps & crisp 20MP photos with our Speed 20 action camera. Every moment is captured with exceptional clarity, ensuring nothing goes unnoticed!This also functions as an excellent underwater camera for capturing your aquatic experiences.

Convenient Dual-Display: Featuring an innovative dual-color screen design, this video camera lets you effortlessly switch between the vivid front screen for perfect selfies and the 2-inch back touch screen for easy control and previewing. Simply press and hold the Mode button to toggle between views in seconds.

Electronic Image Stabilization 2.0: Featuring enhanced 6-axis EIS, this action camera delivers gimbal-like stability for incredibly smooth and steady footage. Whether you’re on the move or capturing fast-paced action, it ensures clear, shake-free videos with exceptional fluidity.

131ft Waterproof Camera: This underwater camera is waterproof up to 131 ft with an IP68-rated enclosure, perfect for water sports like swimming, surfing, and snorkeling. It includes various accessories to enhance your experience for both indoor and outdoor use.

Wireless Wrist Remote Control Sports Camera: Capture the world in a whole new way with the 2.4G wrist remote. Easily control the camera, frame shots, and record videos with convenience. (Note: The remote is not waterproof.)

name: GoPro HERO Session Waterproof Digital Action Camera
short_description: Simple, grab and go operation with a compact, waterproof design and weight of just 2.6 ounce (74 grams), Hero session is the perfect camera for first time GoPro users
Easy one button control press the button once to power on the camera and begin capturing video or photos automatically
Designed to withstand extreme environments and conditions, Hero session is waterproof to 33 feet (10 meter), no housing needed

Additional GoPro Hero session features + benefits below on item page; Hero session camera supports up to 128gb; For the best results we recommend formatting your microSD card regularly; Does not have LCD display
Stunning GoPro video quality records stunning 1440p30, 1080p60 and 720p100 video; powerful photo capture captures 8mp single photos, 10 FPS burst photos and 0.5 to 60 second time lapse photos
product_description: Hero Session packs the power of GoPro into a convenient, grab-and-go, everyday camera. Perfect for the first–time GoPro user, or as a second camera, Hero Session is our simplest camera to use. A single button powers on the camera and starts recording automatically, then when you stop recording, the camera automatically powers itself off. With 1080p60 video and 8MP photo capture, Hero Session delivers the stunning image quality that has made GoPro famous, and its rugged, waterproof design is our first to eliminate the need for a separate housing. So small, so simple, Hero Session is perfect to take on any adventure. What's in the box? - Hero Session Camera - The Standard Frame - Curved Adhesive Mount - Flat Adhesive Mount - Mounting Buckle + Hardware - Micro-USB Cable GoPro Hero Session: Hero Session - the super simple, grab-and-go, everyday waterproof action camera Easy one button control - Press the button once to power on the camera and begin capturing video or photos automatically High resolution of 1440 pixels per inch delivers sharp, professional video Light and compact (2.6 ounces), rugged and waterproof (33 ft.), Hero Session captures amazing new perspectives Supports 1080p60 / 1440p30 (4:3) Video; captures 8MP Still Photos with its Ultra Wide Angle Glass Lens + SuperView

name: GoPro HERO13 Black - Waterproof Action Camera with 5.3K60 Video, 27MP Photo + Compatability with HB-Series Lenses
short_description: Best-in-class 5.3K60 video and legendary durability combine with new HB-Series Lenses1 and a more powerful battery to make HERO13 Black the essential camera for every creator.
product_description: HERO13 Black is the camera for every creator. In addition to best-in-class 5.3K60 video and legendary GoPro durability, it’s compatible with new HB-Series Lenses.1 These lenses expand your capture capabilities for the most immersive POV shots, the ability to focus closer than ever, easy-to-achieve motion blur using neutral density filters and cinematic anamorphic footage. A new more powerful Enduro battery extends recording time in all weather conditions, while an updated mounting system gives HERO13 Black more mounting flexibility than any GoPro before it. With essential GoPro features including award-winning HyperSmooth 6.0 video stabilization, automatic highlight videos and the ability to auto upload your footage to the cloud,2 HERO13 Black is a powerful combination of leading-edge tech and endless creative possibilities.

name: Minolta 4K Ultra HD Pocket Camcorder – WiFi Enabled Action Camera with 16MP Photos, 170° Wide Angle Lens, 270° Rotating Head, Slow Motion, 1.3-inch Display - 16GB Card & Waterproof Case (Red)
short_description: 16MP HIGH-RESOLUTION PHOTOS: Take stunning 16-megapixel still images ideal for enlargements and social sharing. Freeze your favorite moments with crisp details and vibrant color—no filters or post-editing needed.

4K VIDEO & SLOW MOTION RECORDING: Capture every second in ultra-sharp 4K at 30fps or full HD 1080p at 60fps. Use slow motion to enhance action scenes in 720p at 120fps—perfect for sports, vlogs, or adventure footage.

170° WIDE ANGLE + ROTATING LENS: Capture more of the action with a 170-degree field of view and a 270° rotating lens head. Easily frame shots from any angle, whether mounted on a helmet or handheld on the go.

WATERPROOF UP TO 100 FEET: Includes a durable waterproof case rated to 100 feet deep. Ideal for snorkeling, diving, and rugged environments—this pocket camcorder is built for wherever your adventures lead.

COMPLETE PACKAGE: Everything you need is included—from a 16GB memory card and waterproof case to helmet strap, clip mount, and tripod adaptor. Built-in WiFi and app integration allow remote control and easy media sharing.
product_description: The Minolta MN4KP1 Pocket Camcorder is your go-anywhere, do-anything digital video companion, built to capture adventures in stunning 4K Ultra HD. Whether you're skiing down a mountain, diving deep underwater, or vlogging your next big trip, this compact camera packs serious capability into a portable form factor. Delivering crisp 4K video at 30fps, the MN4KP1 brings your memories to life in cinematic detail. Switch to slow motion recording for dramatic replays at 60fps in Full HD or an impressive 120fps in 720p. Whether filming fast-paced action or nature scenes, every frame remains smooth and vivid. This rugged pocket camcorder also serves as a high-quality still camera, offering 16MP photo resolution for crystal-clear images. Ideal for scenic shots, portraits, or capturing action in the moment, the MN4KP1 helps preserve every detail. Equipped with a 170° wide-angle lens, you can capture an immersive field of view that fits more into every shot—great for group adventures or landscape scenes. The 270° rotating lens head adds flexibility to your shooting angles, making it easy to record from above, below, or side angles without repositioning your mount. Thanks to built-in WiFi, the MN4KP1 syncs with a dedicated smartphone app, letting you control the camera wirelessly, preview footage in real-time, and manage your media on the fly. Share instantly, or back up your files with ease. Take the adventure even deeper with the included waterproof housing, rated for use up to 100 feet underwater. Whether you're surfing, swimming, or diving, this camcorder is built to capture every splash. The MN4KP1 comes fully equipped with everything you need right out of the box, including a 16GB memory card, underwater case, helmet strap, clip mount, tripod socket adaptor, USB cable, lanyard, and more—making it a truly complete action recording solution.

name: 4K Underwater Camera 11FT Waterproof Camera with 32GB Card 56MP Autofocus Dual-Screen Selfie Underwater Camera for Snorkeling Waterproof Compact Floatable Digital Camera 1250mAh Battery Type-C (Blue)
short_description: 【4K UHD Waterproof Camera】 Experience the thrill of underwater exploration with our 4K waterproof camera. With a stunning 4K video and 56MP photo resolution, it captures every aquatic adventure in crisp, breathtaking detail. Perfect for snorkeling, this camera is your ticket to the world of underwater. Dive in, capture the moment, and let our camera bring your underwater journey to life. Unleash the explorer within you!

【Autofocus Underwater Camera】 Unleash your inner photographer with our underwater camera. Equipped with an intuitive autofocus function, it's as simple as half-pressing the shutter to focus - watch for the focus frame turning green on the screen, then fully press to capture stunning photos. It's so easy to use, even beginners can master it in no time. Dive in and start creating beautiful underwater memories today!

【11FT Waterproof Digital Camera】 Immerse yourself in underwater exploration without worrying about battery life. Our waterproof digital camera boasts a high-capacity 1250mAh battery, delivering an impressive 70 minutes of operation at 11FT underwater on a single charge. Dive deeper, stay longer, and capture every moment of your aquatic adventure. With our camera, you're free to explore the underwater world to your heart's content. Dive in and let the fun begin!

【Dual-Screen Selfie Floatable Camera】 Capture shared moments with our dual-screen floatable camera. Its innovative front and rear screen design lets you include everyone in the frame, making it perfect for group photos. Lightweight and portable, it's a breeze to carry and operate. Ideal for kids, it's a hit at family gatherings, water parks, and vacations. Dive into fun and create cherished memories with our user-friendly camera!

【Warm Tips】 Never miss a moment with our camera's expansive storage, supporting micro-SD cards up to 128GB (includes a 32GB card). The battery compartment is expertly sealed for waterproof protection, ensuring your camera stays safe underwater. To open the battery door, simply press the cover lock with one hand while pushing out the battery cover with the other. Dive in and capture every adventure with ease and confidence!

name: AKASO Brave 4 4K30fps 20MP WiFi Action Camera Ultra Hd with EIS 131ft Waterproof Camera Remote Control 5xZoom Underwater Camcorder with 2 Batteries and Bicycle Helmet Accessories Kit
short_description: 4K30fps Video & 20MP Photo: Capture every detail of life’s most beautiful moments with video resolutions from 4K 30fps to 1080P 60fps and 20MP photos so you can relive them anytime, anywhere. Start recording the wonders of your life.

170° Adjustable View Angle and Image Stabilization: With four customizable viewing angles of 170°, 140°, 110°, and 70°, capture the perfect perspective for any situation. Built-in smart gyroscope technology ensures shock-resistant and stable shooting, leading to incredibly smooth, professional-looking footage that stands out from the competition.

Sport Camera with Wifi and HDMI: This action camera comes equipped with both Wi-Fi and HDMI capabilities, allowing you to quickly and effortlessly share and edit videos with the free app. Simply download the app on your phone or tablet and connect with the camera. With a Wi-Fi signal range of up to 10 meters and an HDMI port for TV connectivity, you can easily share your exciting experiences with friends and family in high quality and on a bigger screen.

131FT Waterproof Camera and Dual Screen: Place your action camera into the waterproof case and securely fasten it, then you can dive below 40 meters. This underwater camera is ideal for water sports such as swimming, surfing, diving, etc. Equipped with a 2“ rear screen and 0.96” front screen, you can effortlessly shoot in various scenarios, ensuring you get the perfect shot every time.

Free Valuable Accessories: This underwater camera comes with a USB Dual Charger and 2 rechargeable 1050mAh batteries, each battery can record up to 90 minutes. We have optimized some accessories for the new version of Brave 4 to make it more suitable for bicycle/motorcycle activities. The kits are available for most kinds of cameras even Gopro. The remote wristband is not waterproof.

name: 4K 30MP Waterproof Action Camera with 60FPS & Dual Screens, 132FT Underwater Camera with 64GB Card, EIS Stabilization, 5X Zoom, WiFi Remote Control Action Camera Ideal for Sports, Snorkeling
short_description: NEXT-LEVEL CLARITY: Elevate your action storytelling with razor-sharp 4K60FPS video and 30MP photos that freeze split-second thrills—from motocross jumps to skydiving freefalls. Every detail pops with 4x the resolution of HD, while the pre-loaded 64GB memory card ensures you shoot longer, bolder, and without interruptions.

DUAL-SCREEN BRILLIANCE: Command your shots like a pro with the 2.0" rear touchscreen for instant settings control and playback, while the 1.4" front display guarantees perfect selfie framing—whether you’re dangling from a cliff or shredding waves. No more guesswork: see yourself in the frame, nail the angle, and keep the adventure rolling.

LEVEL STABILITY: The advanced 6-axis EIS neutralizes vibrations from rough trails, aerial flips, or turbulent waters, transforming shaky chaos into silky-smooth footage. Capture mountain bike descents or skateboard tricks with the confidence that every frame will look polished

DEPTH DEFENDER: Dive into coral reefs or stormy surf with the ultra-durable waterproof case, protecting your camera down to 40 meters (132FT). Shoot vibrant underwater scenes while snorkeling, scuba diving, or whitewater rafting—no special gear needed. Waterproof adventure starts here.
WIFI-SMART CONTROL: Capture Hands-Free, Master your shots from afar with the 2.4G wrist remote—start/stop recording or snap photos without touching the camera.
